items.label: 5761ac975457a3650cba0c10
items.name: 2 Residential Service Single Phase
items.description:
Available
In all territory served by the Company in the State of Wyoming.

Applicable
To single-family residential Customers for all single-phase electric service for domestic purposes when supplied at one point of delivery. For three-phase service, see Schedule 18.

When a portion of a dwelling is used regularly for business, professional or other gainful purposes and 50 percent or more of the electrical energy supplied to that dwelling is being used for residential purposes, the premises shall be subject to this or other residential rates. If 50 percent or more of the electrical energy supplied to the premises is used for other than residential purposes, the premises will be classified as non-residential and electric service shall be provided under the appropriate non-residential schedule. However, if the wiring is so arranged that the service for residential purposes can be metered separately, this Schedule will be applied to such service.
items.energycomments: Rate = Delivery + Transmission + Generation | Adjustments = Energy Cost Adjustment mechanism + REC and SO2 Revenue Adjustment mechanism + Bonus Tax Depreciation adjustment + Customer Efficiency Service charge
